decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly with a mix of aggressive creatures and burn spells. Cards like Guide of Souls and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer provide early pressure, while Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah offer additional threats. Showdown of the Skalds helps refill your hand and maintain pressure. Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment provide reach to finish off opponents. Static Prison can help control the board and protect your creatures. Overall, this deck looks to establish a fast and aggressive board presence to quickly close out games.

The main focus of this deck is to control the opponent through countering spells, removal, and card advantage. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while efficiently deploying threats of its own, such as Murktide Regent and Psychic Frog. The key strategy involves using spells like Counterspell, Fatal Push, and Force of Negation to control the board and protect your own creatures. The deck also utilizes graveyard recursion with cards like Unearth and Nihil Spellbomb to outvalue the opponent in the long game.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble a powerful combo using cards that do not require lands. The strategy focuses on countering opponent's spells and disrupting their game plan while ramping up mana with cards like Lotus Bloom. The combo involves cards like Goblin Charbelcher and Thundertrap Trainer to deal massive damage to the opponent quickly. Additionally, cards like Disrupting Shoal and Pact of Negation provide protection for the combo pieces. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its pieces and overwhelm the opponent before they can respond effectively.

The deck focuses on using the combination of Underworld Breach, Mishra's Bauble, and Grinding Station to create a loop that allows the player to continuously cast spells from their graveyard. This combo is supported by cards like Faithless Looting and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to dig for key pieces. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler and Portable Hole to control the board. Ultimately, the goal is to set up the win condition of casting Thassa's Oracle to win the game by emptying the library.

This Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on aggressively attacking the opponent while disrupting their strategy with discard spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek. The deck also includes powerful finishers such as Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Emperor of Bones to maintain pressure on the opponent. The removal spells like Fatal Push and Fell the Profane help control the board while creatures like Boggart Trawler and Orcish Bowmasters provide additional threats. The deck's key concept revolves around maximizing damage output and disrupting the opponent's game plan to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this Dimir Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan through a mix of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. The deck aims to keep the opponent's board clear with cards like Fatal Push and Stern Scolding, while deploying threats like Murktide Regent and Abhorrent Oculus to close out the game. The inclusion of disruptive creatures like Psychic Frog and Harbinger of the Seas adds to the deck's control aspect, allowing it to maintain board presence while disrupting the opponent's strategy. Ultimately, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through careful resource management and strategic play.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of powerful elemental creatures and versatile removal spells. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Supreme Verdict and Solitude, while also utilizing strong elemental creatures like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Risen Reef to generate advantage and pressure the opponent. The inclusion of Keruga, the Macrosage as a companion provides additional card advantage in longer games. Overall, this deck is built to control the game and outvalue the opponent through a combination of removal and powerful creature synergies.
